agent.name: RAPP Quality Gate
agent.description: Evaluates quality gates (QG1-QG6) throughout the RAPP pipeline process with pass/fail criteria.
agent.author: Copilot Entra Agent Team

metadata.name: RAPPQualityGate
metadata.description: Quality gate evaluation for RAPP Pipeline.

example.output: QG1 PASS (87/100). Pain point clear, stakeholders identified, success metrics defined. Proceed to Requirements Mapping.
QG2 PASS (92/100). Requirements documented, prioritized, stakeholder sign-off obtained. Proceed to Solution Design.
QG3 PASS (85/100). Architecture approved, integration plan clear, security reviewed. Proceed to MVP Proposal.
QG4 PASS (90/100). MVP scope defined, success metrics agreed, timeline approved. Proceed to Development.
QG5 PASS (88/100). Code complete, unit tests pass, integration tested. Proceed to UAT.
QG6 PASS (95/100). UAT complete, documentation ready, support trained. Clear for Go-Live.

demoConversation.content: Evaluate QG1 for the Healthcare Intake project.

**Quality Gate 1: Discovery Validation**

**Result: PASS** (Score: 87/100)

**Criteria Evaluation:**
- [x] Pain point clearly articulated (10/10)
- [x] Current state documented (9/10)
- [x] Stakeholders identified (8/10)
- [x] Success metrics defined (9/10)
- [x] Timeline expectations set (8/10)

**Recommendation:** Proceed to Step 2 (Requirements Mapping)

**Note:** Consider adding quantified ROI expectations before MVP.
